HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Play Time Tracker has been merged into this mod. Additional options from Play Time Tracker are now available in the Mod Options menu.
Added new SPTT display location: "Hidden". You may now disable the Play Time Tracker component by setting its display location to "Hidden" in the Mod Options menu.
The SPTT now excludes time periods where RimWorld is minimized or your computer is sleeping, etc.
Added option to hide the millisecond part of the Session Play Time Tracker (SPTT).
Declares that this mod is compatible with RW v1.2.|As a rule of thumb, it is unlikely that this mod will become incompatible with any future RW releases, but do let me know otherwise.
Added option to simplify the Session Play Time Tracker (SPTT) alert label text. Fixed bug with trailing colon (":") when milliseconds are turned off.
Updated to RW v1.4. Features are unchanged.
Removed $HugsLibChecker because it is obsolete and causing problems.
Session play time will now correctly accumulate when running the game in background.

This mod is now compatible with multiplayer.|Bugfix for multiplayer:| - Session play time will no longer reset when the multiplayer status is changed - This includes starting a new multiplayer session and converting a multiplayer world back to singleplayer
Removed harmless but unintended error message. (v4.0.5.4 was released in 2023 but its changenote was not added at that time.)
Cleaned up the code base and rebuilt the mod for RimWorld 1.5; mod version is now provided through the About.xml file.

This is the 7th year of the journey of this mod. (Are you still here?)
!!! IMPORTANT !!!
This mod now no longer depends on HugsLib, which means the following: - You must manually reapply your previous settings; and - This method of displaying update news is discontinued
